attributes.action: ignore the petiton asking for petrol prices to be displayed in gallons and publicise clearly that there has been no change in the law relating to the display of weights and measures used for trade.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The EU statement related to future proposals to abolish the use of the Imperial measures entirely after 2009. 

There are no changes to existing law which requires the primary display to be in metric.  

any public statement should point out that the Imperial system as we know it was a reconstruction produced in 1823 becasue the previous English System was felt to be inferior to metric
